title: Wisdom and Genius - Paragraph 5 can be described

content.question: Paragraph 5 ("We proceed ... vain") can best be described as

choices.label: a pessimistic explanation of human motivation
an exhortation to improve typical human behavior
a metaphoric encapsulation of the speaker's thesis
a laudatory commentary on human ambition

content.answer: a pessimistic explanation of human motivation

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
